meta.job_title: Program Manager (Wiki/Website Creation and Azure DevOps)

duties_responsibilities.duty: Develop and implement a methodology and tracking board for ad-hoc requests.
Compile information and examples from different teams and create new wiki pages/websites for the entire group.
Assist with presentation materials and communicate program status and deliverables.
Consolidate team boards and design KPI tracking for analytics outputs and deliverables.
Support the Technical Program Manager in Insights Process Tracking.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, or a related field (Master's preferred)
